channel.title: unicode on Go 中文档集
channel.description: Recent content in unicode on Go 中文档集

item.title: utf16
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/unicode/utf16@go1.24.2 Package utf16 implements encoding and decoding of UTF-16 sequences. ​ utf16包实现了UTF-16序

item.title: utf8
item.description: 原文：https://pkg.go.dev/unicode/utf8@go1.24.2 Package utf8 implements functions and constants to support text encoded in UTF-8. It includes functions to translate between runes and UTF-8 byte sequences. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-8 ​ u
